body.name: Gulicola Natural Glass Baby Bottle 4 Pack, Newborn Breastfeeding Bottles Gift Set, Extra Slow Flow Nipples (SS), Anti Colic, 0 Months+, 5 oz - Pink
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 5 mins
features: Newborns Feeding set: include 4 packs of 5 oz bottle with Extra slow flow nipple (0m+), 4 counts of storage cap;
Premium Borosilicate Glass: Naturally free of BPA, BPS, Phthalate and toxins, making it a peace-of-mind option for parents;
New Design Nipple: points on the nipple guiding for appropriate latch, train babies with correct suction habits in breastfeeding;

Great for Nursing Moms: Ultra-soft nipple mimics natural feel, flex and movement of breastfeeding, helps breastfed baby naturally latch on, anti-colic vents allow your baby to drink continuously without gasping for air or drinking bubbles;
Easy to Clean: these wide neck baby bottles only have 4 pieces and can easily be cleaned and reassembled as often as needed, Sterilized in bottle warmer, microwave, sterilizer and boiling water.
body.description: Gulicola Natural Glass Baby Bottle Over the past decade, we have been focusing on research on baby feeding and adopting high quality standards from raw materials to production and ultimately to finished products. The reason why we have been continuously doing this is to allow more babies to experience excellent products and make more mothers feel at ease. PREMIUM BOROSILICATE GLASS GREAT FOR NURSING MOMS NATURAL FEEL NIPPLE EASY TO CLEAN

The reason why we have been continuously doing this is to allow more babies to experience excellent products and make more mothers feel at ease. Gulicola Bottle Nipples Food-grade High-quality silicone material, babies can use it safely. Ultra-soft Mimics natural feel, flex and movement of breastfeeding. Stretch-well Not easily broken even if bitten by babies. New-design Points on the nipple guiding for appropriate latch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite bottles
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a glass bottle that was similar to the Lansinoh nipple shape because I go between nursing and bottle often. The design and material is high quality and I am very impressed! My breast fed baby took to these bottles right away without any hesitation which was such a relief. The smaller bottles come with slow flow nipples (s) which are a perfect flow. I purchased the extra slow flow (ss) nipples but I do not think they were needed. The larger size bottles come with medium (m) which we will switch to soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, a touch fast but with bottle pacing it’s fine. Great quality. Light weight for glass bottles. Easy to clean. Soft nipple, recommended by my lactation consult for my daughters tongue tie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly slow flow, high quality
reviews.reviewText: 3rd time mom: my babies always had a hard time using bottles due to the flow not being slow enough.. I drip tested the nipple put water and flipped it upside down and nothing came out, and tried it myself and it took effort to get water out. Will update once baby is born. Also they feel like luxury bottles from the packaging to the bottle everything was wrapped and sealed in nice packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love them so much, I bought more!
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are my new favorite! Don’t have to worry about plastic. They're sturdy and high quality. I dropped one once and it didn’t break thankfully but it’s definitely not something to make a habit out of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Glass Lansinoh alternative
reviews.reviewText: Great bottle.Pros: Couldn't find lansinoh 5oz glass bottle so I bought this instead since my baby will only take nipple of this specify shape. Lansinoh and Pigeon brand also have lead paint controversy so I was hesitant.The nipple is soft and baby likes it a lot.Truly slow flow!One Con: the top cover is hard to pop off. When trying to pop it off the whole top with the nipple unscrews unless very careful. (Which is hard sometimes when you have baby on one hand and trying to juggle the bottle on the other).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not leak!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the way it was packaged. I love the nipple. I love the top of the bottle it does not leak. Best bottle for breast-feeding moms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I almost exclusively breastfeed and was looking for a bottle that will not mess up my baby’s latch. And I am impressed. I don’t know if it was the purpose but I think it helped her establish an even better latch then before.super easy to clean. Only concern with the glass is my baby growing more and being able to throw and break them. But I will find out eventually! Will be getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compatible with lansinoh
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for glass bottles to fit lansinoh nipples are these are perfect. We have never had a leakage problem. Will buy again for my next baby.
